topic.title: 微信在偷偷扫描并上传手机里的图片库？Dose WeChat scan and upload my phone's Picture Library?
topic.body:
今天手机莫名的发热严重，掉电飞快。一看电池消耗，过去24小时微信消耗了超过50%的电量！经试验，把微信的图片权限关闭后，手机立马就不烫了。看来这里的问题很大，细思恐极。
My phone got so hot today.  So i checked the battery consumption where showed WeChat used more than 50%.  As I shut down the privacy of Picture Library to WeChat, the phone gets cool soon.  Have you get any conclusion?
